languages.text: "Таков твой ответ?" {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза рукой и впервые смеется, печально и горько.{/n} "И как я могла помыслить, что кто-то из рода мон-кай может... А, впрочем, неважно. Однажды твои страх и ненависть поглотят тебя изнутри, элантах. Слава Ише, меня уже не будет подле. Прощай, чужак из тьмы меж звезд. На этом... наш общий путь обрывается".

traits.locale_text: "Таков твой ответ?" {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза рукой и впервые смеется, печально и горько.{/n} "И как я могла помыслить, что кто-то из рода мон-кай может... А, впрочем, неважно. Однажды твои страх и ненависть поглотят тебя изнутри, элантах. Слава Ише, меня уже не будет подле. Прощай, чужак из тьмы меж звезд. На этом... наш общий путь обрывается".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "So that is your answer?" {n}Yrliet covers her eyes with her hand and laughs for the first time, sadly and bitterly.{/n} "How could I ever have thought that a mon-keigh would... It does not matter. One day, your fear and hatred will consume you from within, elantach. Praise Isha, I will no longer be at your side when they do. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Our shared Path ends here."
languages.original_text: "Таков твой ответ?" {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза рукой и впервые смеется, печально и горько.{/n} "И как я могла помыслить, что кто-то из рода мон-кай может... А, впрочем, неважно. Однажды твои страх и ненависть поглотят тебя изнутри, элантах. Слава Ише, меня уже не будет подле. Прощай, чужак из тьмы меж звезд. На этом... наш общий путь обрывается".

It does not matter. One day, your fear and hatred will consume you from within, elantach. Praise Isha, I will no longer be at your side when they do. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. This marks the end of our shared journey."

It does not matter. One day, your fear and hatred will consume you from within, elantach. Praise Isha, I will no longer be at your side when they do. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Our shared Path ends here."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « C'est votre réponse ? » {n}Yrliet se couvre les yeux d'une main et rit pour la première fois, avec tristesse et amertume.{/n} « Comment ai-je pu penser qu'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh... Peu importe. Un jour, votre peur et votre haine vous dévoreront de l'intérieur, elantach. Isha soit louée, je ne serai plus à vos côtés lorsque cela se produira. Adieu, {mf|étranger|étrangère} parmi les astres. Notre Voie commune s'achève ici. »
languages.original_text: "So that is your answer?" {n}Yrliet covers her eyes with her hand and laughs for the first time, sadly and bitterly.{/n} "How could I ever have thought that a mon-keigh would... It does not matter. One day, your fear and hatred will consume you from within, elantach. Praise Isha, I will no longer be at your side when they do. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Our shared Path ends here."

traits.locale_text: « C'est votre réponse ? » {n}Yrliet se couvre les yeux d'une main et rit pour la première fois, avec tristesse et amertume.{/n} « Comment ai-je pu penser qu'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh... Peu importe. Un jour, votre peur et votre haine vous dévoreront de l'intérieur, elantach. Isha soit louée, je ne serai plus à vos côtés lorsque cela se produira. Adieu, {mf|étranger|étrangère} parmi les astres. C'est ici que notre histoire commune se termine. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “原来这就是你的答案吗？”{n}伊莉耶特一只手捂住了眼睛，第一次哈哈大笑起来，她的声音充满了悲伤与痛苦。{/n}“我怎么会指望猴子会……不要紧，总有一天，你的恐惧与仇恨会从将你吞噬。赞美爱莎，当你堕入黑暗之时，我不会再留在你身边了。永别了，来自群星与黑暗之中的陌生人，我们共同的旅途到此为止了。”
languages.original_text: "So that is your answer?" {n}Yrliet covers her eyes with her hand and laughs for the first time, sadly and bitterly.{/n} "How could I ever have thought that a mon-keigh would... It does not matter. One day, your fear and hatred will consume you from within, elantach. Praise Isha, I will no longer be at your side when they do. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Our shared Path ends here."

traits.locale_text: “原来这就是你的答案吗？”{n}伊莉耶特一只手捂住了眼睛，第一次哈哈大笑起来，她的声音充满了悲伤与痛苦。{/n}“我怎么会指望猴子会……不要紧，总有一天，你的恐惧与仇恨会从将你吞噬。赞美爱莎，当你堕入黑暗之时，我不会再留在你身边了。永别了，来自群星与黑暗之中的陌生人，我们共同的旅途到此为止了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「それがあなたの答えなのか？」{n}ユリエットは手で目を覆い、悲しげな苦笑いを初めて浮かべた。{/n}「モン＝ケイに一度でも期待するなんて…いや、そんなことはどうでもいい。いつか、その恐怖と憎悪があなたを内側から蝕むだろう、エランタよ。その時、幸いにも我はもうあなたの側にはいない。さらばだ、星々の闇から来たよそ者よ。我らが共に歩む道はここで終わる」
languages.original_text: "So that is your answer?" {n}Yrliet covers her eyes with her hand and laughs for the first time, sadly and bitterly.{/n} "How could I ever have thought that a mon-keigh would... It does not matter. One day, your fear and hatred will consume you from within, elantach. Praise Isha, I will no longer be at your side when they do. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Our shared Path ends here."

traits.locale_text: 「それがあなたの答えなのか？」{n}ユリエットは手で目を覆い、悲しげな苦笑いを初めて浮かべた。{/n}「モン＝ケイに一度でも期待するなんて…いや、そんなことはどうでもいい。いつか、その恐怖と憎悪があなたを内側から蝕むだろう、エランタよ。その時、幸いにも我はもうあなたの側にはいない。さらばだ、星々の闇から来たよそ者よ。我らが共に歩む道はここで終わる」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist also Eure Antwort?" {n}Yrliet verdeckt sich mit der Hand die Augen und lacht zum ersten Mal, traurig und verbittert.{/n} "Wie konnte ich je glauben, dass {mf|ein|eine} Chem-Pan-Sey ... Es spielt keine Rolle mehr. Eines Tages werden Euch Eure Angst und Euer Hass von innen noch verzehren, Elantach. Gepriesen sei Isha, wenn das passiert, werde ich nicht mehr an Euer Seite sein. Lebt wohl, {mf|Fremder|Fremde} aus der Finsternis der Sterne. Unser gemeinsamer Pfad endet hier."
languages.original_text: "So that is your answer?" {n}Yrliet covers her eyes with her hand and laughs for the first time, sadly and bitterly.{/n} "How could I ever have thought that a mon-keigh would... It does not matter. One day, your fear and hatred will consume you from within, elantach. Praise Isha, I will no longer be at your side when they do. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Our shared Path ends here."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist also Eure Antwort?" {n}Yrliet verdeckt mit einer Hand ihre Augen und lacht zum ersten Mal, traurig und verbittert.{/n} "Wie konnte ich nur je erwägen, dass {mfein|eine} Chem-Pan-Sey ... Es spielt keine Rolle mehr. Eines Tages werden Euch Eure Angst und Euer Hass von innen noch verzehren, Elantach. Gepriesen sei Isha, wenn das passiert, werde ich nicht mehr an Euer Seite sein. Lebt wohl, {mf|Fremder|Fremde} aus der Finsternis der Sterne. Das ist das Ende unserer gemeinsamen Reise."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Conque esa es tu respuesta?». {n}Yrliet se cubre los ojos con la mano y ríe por primera vez, una risa triste y amarga.{/n} «Cómo he podido pensar que {mf|un|una} mon-keigh... Tanto da. Algún día, tu miedo y tu odio te consumirán desde dentro, elantach. Loada sea Isha, cuando eso ocurra yo ya no estaré a tu lado. Adiós, {mf|forastero|forastera} de la oscuridad interestelar. Nuestra senda deja de ser una».
languages.original_text: "So that is your answer?" {n}Yrliet covers her eyes with her hand and laughs for the first time, sadly and bitterly.{/n} "How could I ever have thought that a mon-keigh would... It does not matter. One day, your fear and hatred will consume you from within, elantach. Praise Isha, I will no longer be at your side when they do. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Our shared Path ends here."

traits.locale_text: «¿Conque esa es tu respuesta?». {n}Yrliet se cubre los ojos con una mano y ríe por primera vez, una risa triste y amarga.{/n} «Cómo he podido pensar que {mf|un|una} mon-keigh... Tanto da. Algún día, tu miedo y tu odio te consumirán desde dentro, elantach. Loada sea Isha, cuando eso ocurra yo ya no estaré a tu lado. Adiós, {mf|forastero|forastera} de la oscuridad interestelar. Aquí termina el viaje que hemos compartido».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Demek yanıtın bu?" {n}Yrliet, gözlerini eliyle kapatıp ilk kez gülüyor. Gülüşü hüzünlü ve acılı.{/n} "Aklımdan neler geçiyordu? Bir mon-keigh'in gidip... Önemli değil. Bir gün korku ve nefret seni içten içe tüketecek elantach. İşa'ya şükürler olsun ki o gün geldiğinde yanında olmayacağım. Hoşça kal yıldızların arasındaki karanlıktan gelen yabancı. Paylaştığımız Yol burada son buluyor."
languages.original_text: "So that is your answer?" {n}Yrliet covers her eyes with her hand and laughs for the first time, sadly and bitterly.{/n} "How could I ever have thought that a mon-keigh would... It does not matter. One day, your fear and hatred will consume you from within, elantach. Praise Isha, I will no longer be at your side when they do. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Our shared Path ends here."

traits.locale_text: "Demek yanıtın bu?" {n}Yrliet gözlerini eliyle kapatıyor ve ilk kez gülüyor. Hüzünlü ve acı bir şekilde.{/n} "Aklımdan neler geçiyordu? Bir mon-keigh'in gidip... Önemli değil. Bir gün korku ve nefret seni içten içe tüketecek elantach. İsha'ya şükürler olsun ki bu olduğunda senin yanında bulunmayacağım. Hoşça kal yıldızların arasındaki karanlıktan gelen yabancı. Paylaştığımız Yol burada son buluyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
